Posts.Content: Thanks for all the encourgement Conchetta. - I've been through a lot of battles in this 16 year war and am still confident and living my life to the fullest. God bless you. Jan
Posts.Title: Alternative vs. Conventional

Posts.Content: My breast cancer has spread to the liver. Am on Faslodex (shot once a month). Oncologist says next step is chemo. He says I have one year in the short term to live and 3 to 4 long term if I go through chemo? Anyone else going through this? I'm wondering what else I can do - are we being aggressive enough? Thanks for all help. Jan
Posts.Title: Alternative vs. Conventional

Posts.Content: Barb - Thanks for your reply. The others all worked for me - each one about half the time as the previous one - the last being Aromasin for about 1 year. How are you doing now? Are you still on chemo? Have been battling for 15 years and am feeling a bit fearful of what might be next. Thanks for your answer - it helps to know someone else is at this same place in our lives. Janice
Posts.Title: Faslodex

Posts.Content: Have just started on Faslodex after Aromasin has failed. Has anyone else had experience with this drug? How long did it work? Went through Tamoxifen, Arimidex, and Aromasin. My oncologist says after Faslodex is chemo. Any thoughts would be appreciated Thanks.
Posts.Title: Faslodex
